title: How to Pixelate Photos in Photoshop

steps.title: Go to File >> Open and select your image.
steps.content: Go to File >> Open and select your image.

steps.title: Choose the cell size (Amount of squares).
steps.content: Choose the cell size (Amount of squares).

steps.title: Select the rectangular marquee tool and drag around the individual object to select it.
steps.content: Select the rectangular marquee tool and drag around the individual object to select it.
